title: PBE sign up?
body:
i cant get to the pbe sign up page it says:
 Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem.
any one know why?

replies.body: We've seen a few reports on this error, and it may be either a [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)issue or how you're routing to our pages.  Are you able to try a VPN to see if you can get to that page?
i cleared all data from my browser and tried using a vpn neither worked any thoughts?

Thanks for trying all that!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look with you individually.  I can't make any guarantees but we'd like to investigate further to see if we can work something out.  We'll reply back asap!
Same Issue here. Got accepted and could not sign up due to above issues. Support told me they cannot manually sign me up.
i pinged the pbe server and its working and giving me a reply so it hast to be routing or something on my computer
